rows.label: qev087002_MSG0001
rows.name: I hope you don't mind I let myself in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0002
rows.name:
From the look on your face, I'm guessing you know
about our meeting with the director general.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0003
rows.name:
And from the look on yours,
I'm guessing you accepted the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0004_2
rows.name: Elma was super clearâ€”if things get dangerous, we'll call it off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0005
rows.name: Well, good. I'm glad to hear that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0006
rows.name:
Don't forget, you're all far more valuable to us
than any intel you might come back with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0007
rows.name: Tatsu totally agree and definitely never forget![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0008
rows.name: In other words, don't worry about us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0009
rows.name: Jair Fortress is crawling with elite Ganglion forces.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0010
rows.name: Even for you, charging the front gates is suicide.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0011
rows.name:
Our scout team reports that security is comparatively
thin along the shore east of the fortress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0012
rows.name:
You could infiltrate from that side and keep out of sight
as you make for the heart of the complex where the
data is stored.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087002_MSG0013
rows.name:
Although I leave the final call to your judgment.
Just don't go dying on me.
You all are worth far more than any intel.[ST:wait ]
